nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -9,7 +9,7 @@ port = 9000
 # "static" - no discovery, only connect to static peers
 # "discv5" - Enable discovery v5
 discovery = "static"
-bootnodes = ""
+#bootnodes = ""

nodes.bodyText: I tried that, it didn't work :/
